Desc.entry: Part of the Diocese of Hallam Caring Service, a registered charity. Provides group support based on the 12-step programme, for people with emotional problems or who are worried about their drinking habits. Individual and couple therapy is available for those experiencing anxiety, depression, stress, low self-esteem, bereavement, relationship problems or domestic violence. Drop-in facilities are also available providing light refreshments, social interaction and various activities for people experiencing isolation and loneliness.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs (individual & couples therapy, by appointment only), Tues at 1pm (breadmaking and reflection class - 6 week sessions), Wed 10.30am-12noon (emotional stress group), Wed at 2pm (art group) other activities please contact for details, Thurs 10.30am-12noon (addiction group), Tues-Thurs 12.30-4pm (social drop-in) and one-to-one sessions available by appointment
